attributes.action: Change the law on selling and buying homes to create a system where binding exchange of contacts occurs when an offer is accepted
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people are having their time wasted and losing money because of "fickle buyers" and also some fickle sellers in the housing market. The current situation where serious buyers / sellers are at the mercy of people who change their minds for no reason after a deal struck is now out of hand with absolutely no redress for time / money lost.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several in existence already -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/repealofHIPs/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
